revised_title: Pharmacological Comparison of Pseudaconitine, Japaconitine, and Aconitine
tldr: This study investigates the pharmacological properties of pseudaconitine and japaconitine, comparing them to aconitine. The authors find that while there are quantitative differences between the three alkaloids, their qualitative actions are similar. The study also highlights the importance of using pure substances in future research to avoid discrepancies in results.
